Name: Image.LensFlare
Desc: Adds a lens flare effect to the image using various presets.
LongDesc: The LensFlare method overlays a lens flare effect on the image, simulating light artifacts caused by bright light sources. It supports multiple presets (cinematic, sciFi, vintage, etc.) and custom parameters for artistic control.
Example:
var img = new Q.Image({ width: 400, height: 300 });
img.Load('photo.jpg', function() { img.LensFlare({ preset: 'cinematic' }); });
